mapper.select:
SELECT IC.id, IC.type, IC.vcid, IC.remark, IC.institutionId FROM INS_INSTITUTION_CAPACITY IC WHERE
AND IC.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INS_INSTITUTION_CAPACITY ( id, type, vcid, remark, institutionId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{vcid}, #{remark}, #{institutionId} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM INS_INSTITUTION_CAPACITY WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE INS_INSTITUTION_CAPACITY
vcid = #{vcid,javaType=java.lang.String},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
